ps.ptxt: Brake fluid leakage from brake lines
Brake disc or pads stained with fluid
Poor contact of shoes on brake drum
Brake shoes linings stained with fluid or wet with water

action.ptxt: Check system and replace as necessary.

ps.ptxt: Pad or shoe linings are wet with water or stained with fluid in some brakes
Drum-to-shoe clearance out of adjustment in some brakes. (malfunctioning auto adjusting mechanism)

action.ptxt: Check for inoperative auto adjusting mechanism.

ps.ptxt: Drum is out of round in some brakes

action.ptxt: Tires with approximately the same amount of tread should be used on the same axle.
Check for soft hoses and damaged lines. Replace with new hoses and new brake piping.
Check for stuck or sluggish pistons and proper lubrication of caliper slide bush.
Caliper should slide. Check all suspension mountings.
Check and torque bolts to specifications.
Check system and replace as necessary.
Check brake systems and repair as necessary.

ps.ptxt: Insufficient fluid in master cylinder reservoirs

action.ptxt: Fill reservoirs with approved brake fluid. Check for leaks and air in brake systems. Check warning light. Bleed system if required.

ps.ptxt: Rear brake system not adjusted (malfunctioning auto adjusting mechanism)

action.ptxt: Repair auto adjusting mechanism. Adjust rear brakes.

condition.ptxt: (A very light drag is present in all disc brakes immediately after pedal is released)

ps.ptxt: Master cylinder pistons not returning correctly

action.ptxt: Check for soft hoses or damaged pipes and replace with new hoes and/or new brake pipes.

ps.ptxt: Incorrect parking brake adjustment on rear brakes

action.ptxt: Check and adjust to correct specifications.

ps.ptxt: Weakened or broken return springs in the brake
Wheel cylinder or caliper piston sticking

action.ptxt: Check system and replace as necessary.

ps.ptxt: Distorted steering knuckle or rear axle shafts

action.ptxt: Replace knuckle or rear axle shaft.
Check per instructions. If not within specifications, replace or machine the disc.
Check per instructions. If not with specifications, replace or machine the disc.
Check runout. Repair or replace drum as necessary.

ps.ptxt: Glazed shoe linings, or foreign matters stuck to linings
Distorted backing plates or loose mounting bolts

condition.ptxt: Brake warning light turns ON after engine start

action.ptxt: Release parking brake and check that brake warning light turns off.

ps.ptxt: Brake fluid leaking from brake line

action.ptxt: Investigate leaky point, correct it and add brake fluid.

ps.ptxt: Malfunctioning EBD system, if equipped with ABS (ESP®)

action.ptxt: Check system referring to EBD Warning Lamp (Brake Warning Lamp) Comes ON Steady .

condition.ptxt: Brake warning light turns on when brake is applied

ps.ptxt: Brake fluid leaking from brake line

action.ptxt: Investigate leaky point, correct it and add brake fluid.

condition.ptxt: Brake warning light fails to turn on even when parking brake is applied
ABS warning light or ESP® warning light does not turn ON for 2 – 3 sec. after ignition switch has turned ON

ps.ptxt: ABS warning light circuit open (including check relay)

action.ptxt: Check system referring to ABS Warning Lamp Does Not Come ON at Ignition Switch ON or ESP® Warning Lamp Does Not Come ON at Ignition Switch ON .

condition.ptxt: ABS warning light or ESP® warning light remains ON after ignition switch has turned ON for 2 – 3 sec.

action.ptxt: Check system referring to ABS Warning Lamp Does Not Come ON at Ignition Switch ON or ESP® Warning Lamp Does Not Come ON at Ignition Switch ON
